attributes.contentHtml:
CertifiedDog Don't call something a shit host bc you don't like it. Terms are terms. Don't agree to them? Fuck off and find another company to bully. They fix the important shit which should have been up to standards before release.

As a note, I am not in any way affiliated to DijxCloud, I just don't like it when little kid bitch at nothing.

I agree they should have not released into "beta" without a proper TOS, but they fixed it. At this point, it is becoming mindless harassment

attributes.bio:
Hi there! I am Sydney, your friendly Aussie web developer! I make things work, and I like hosting things

(I have an Iceey Certified TOS :3)
